subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Wages and Salaries
Football
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The tentative labor accord moves professional basketball toward parity, which has strengthened the N.F.L. but may hurt a league accustomed to champions from cities like Los Angeles and Chicago.
snippet: The tentative labor accord moves professional basketball toward parity, which has strengthened the N.F.L. but may hurt a league accustomed to champions from cities like Los Angeles and Chicago.
